description:
After Installing Rider, Miyu attempts to finish Bazett using her Noble Phantasm, but it ends up countered by Bazett`s trump card. Bazett coldly approaches the seriously wounded Kuro to retrieve the final remaining Card. Despite the desperate situation and wounds all over her body, Illya makes one final attempt to stop her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sono Te ga Mamotta Mono wa
その手が守ったものは
